emails.subject: Welcome to Frame Email Client
emails.body: Hello! This is a test email to help you get started with Frame Email Client. Feel free to reply and test the conversation threading feature.

emails.subject: Re: Welcome to Frame Email Client
emails.body: Thanks for the welcome! This looks great. I'm excited to try out all the features.

emails.subject: Meeting Tomorrow
emails.body: Don't forget about our meeting tomorrow at 2 PM. We'll discuss the project roadmap.

emails.subject: Re: Meeting Tomorrow
emails.body: I'll be there! Should I prepare anything specific?

emails.subject: Project Update
emails.body: Here's the latest update on the project. Everything is on track and we're meeting all our milestones.

emails.subject: Question about API
emails.body: I have a question about the API endpoints. Can you help me understand the authentication flow?

emails.subject: Re: Question about API
emails.body: Sure! The authentication uses JWT tokens. Let me send you the documentation.

emails.subject: Lunch Plans
emails.body: Want to grab lunch today? There's a new place that opened downtown.

emails.subject: Re: Re: Welcome to Frame Email Client
emails.body: Just wanted to follow up - have you had a chance to test the search feature yet?

emails.subject: Bug Report
emails.body: I found a small issue with the dark mode toggle. It doesn't persist after refresh.
